name: Archipelago: Navigable VR Comic
description: Archipelago is a navigable VR comic containing 65 characters and 6,787 lines of dialogue. It is intended to be a family-friendly story world, suitable for all ages. It is NOT A GAME. You are placed inside a comic world as multiple stories play out in real-time around you.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel I5-6400 CPU 2.70GHZ Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NIVIDIA GTX970 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
